text: Aberdeen is a city in the northeastern part of the U.S. state of South Dakota. It is the third largest city in the state; 28,495 people lived there at the 2020 census. The city is home to Northern State University, a major college in the state of South Dakota. Aberdeen became a city in 1882. == References == == Other websites == *City of Aberdeen website Category:County seats in South Dakota Category:1880 establishments in Dakota Territory
title: Aberdeen, South Dakota
